name: Keyhole Spy: Naughty Witches
description:
Halloween is coming, and witches are preparing for it. They practice spells to impress each other, make lists of men tempted this year and, of course, choose clothes for the big day.

You have a unique chance to use a magic mirror and watch how the most charming witches of the city spend their time. To make the mirror work, you'll have to collect magic elements three in a row. The more points you score, the better you can see the witch girls! When an image of a girl becomes as detailed as possible, you can do something else with her... This is not quite what you’ve just thought, but it will also bring a lot of pleasure.

Keyhole Spy: Naughty Witches is a funny game that will entertain you not only at the Halloween’s eve, but at any time of the year.

- Charming half-dressed witches with big pumpkins
- An atmospheric mini-game that can be played with each girl
- Funny achievements

Keyhole Spy: Naughty Witches is the best way to spend time with pleasure in your room
